title: Washington Republicans Drop Steve Knight (DCCC - Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee)
text: ( Source : DCCC - Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee ) Seven months after Republican Congressman Steve Knight ( CA-25 ) snapped on camera and threatened a protester 'If you touch me again, I'll drop your ass,' it appears that Knight is
